longDescription: The field of cybersecurity can be daunting for beginners due to the sheer volume of unstructured information available online. Developed under the guidance of my college's cybersecurity club, this repository addresses that problem by providing a comprehensive and curated collection of resources for learning ethical hacking. It organizes high-quality videos, articles, and my personal notes into a structured learning path. Topics range from foundational networking concepts and Linux commands to advanced penetration testing techniques. This guide serves as a valuable, ever-growing knowledge base for aspiring cybersecurity professionals to build their skills systematically.
